faq.title: FAQ
faq.intro: Get answers to the most frequent questions.

items.question: Can you help me secure housing?
items.answer: Yes. The Comfort and Premium packs include housing support and a guaranteed temporary solution.

items.question: Do you assist with administrative paperwork?
items.answer: Yes. Every pack covers SIN registration, banking, SIM card, and insurance guidance.

items.question: Is follow-up included?
items.answer: Yes: 7 days with the Essential pack, 30 days with Comfort, and unlimited support with Premium.

items.question: Is airport welcome available?
items.answer: Yes. Airport welcome is included starting with the Comfort pack and fully expanded in the Premium pack.
